TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RefreshPropertiesAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that the property grid should refresh when the associated property value changes. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The RefreshPropertiesAttribute indicates the type of refresh mode to use when refreshing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the RefreshPropertiesAttribute class to specify the refresh mode for a `DataSource` property. For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](../Topic/How%20to:%20Apply%20Attributes%20in%20Windows%20Forms%20Controls.md).
[!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AttributesDemoControl#25](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.componentmodel._91_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.ComponentModel.AttributesDemoControl#25](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.componentmodel._91_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.ComponentModel.RefreshProperties refresh) cil managed

Docs.param: A value indicating the nature of the refresh.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshPropertiesAttribute> class is used for refreshing the design-time view.

Docs.summary: Indicates that all properties are queried again and refreshed if the property value is changed. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Specify this attribute on a property to query again and refresh all properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> when the property value changes. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> caches data. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshProperties> mode causes the Properties window to query each property again and refresh its view.

Docs.summary: Indicates that no other properties are refreshed if the property value is changed. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Specify this attribute on a property to refresh only the associated property when the property value is changed.

Docs.summary: Gets the refresh properties for the member.
Docs.value: A that indicates the current refresh properties for the member.
Docs.returns: A that indicates the current refresh properties for the member.

Docs.summary: Indicates that all properties are repainted if the property value is changed. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Specify this attribute on a property to repaint all properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> when the property value changes.
